verbs.description: After [ARG0: FBI agents] [V: raided] [ARG1: the office and residence of Trump 's lawyer , Michael Cohen] , Cohen asked a judge to grant a stay for at least 90 days .

After FBI agents raided the office and residence of Trump 's lawyer , Michael Cohen , Cohen asked [ARG0: a judge] to [V: grant] [ARG1: a stay] [ARGM-TMP: for at least 90 days] .
